Title: Style King
Writer: Pc Shekhar (story), Pc Shekhar (screenplay), Pc Shekhar (dialogue), V. Nagendra Prasad (lyricist), Kaviraj (lyricist), Chandan Shetty (lyricist)
Actors: Ganesh, Ramya Nambeeshan, Rangayana Raghu, Sadhu Kokila
Plot: Karthik and Kashi look alike, but Karthik aspires to be a sub-inspector while Kashi is a criminal mastermind. What happens when they end up being in the same city with a bag of stolen cocaine playing games in their nearly-perfect lives?
